title: Sora 2 vs Gamma AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Sora 2 vs Gamma AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Sora 2 and Gamma AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Sora 2 vs Gamma AI
paragraphs: Sora 2 (generative ai) is Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest text-to-video generation model that creates high-quality, realistic videos up to 20 seconds long from text prompts or images. Released in September 2026, it features synchronized dialogue, ambient sound effects, and background music generated natively alongside video. Its key differentiator is the ability to generate cinematic, physically accurate videos with native audio in multiple styles including realistic, anime, and stylized formats.. It's known for video-generation, text-to-video, ai-video.

Gamma AI (productivity) is Gamma is an AI-powered presentation platform that creates professional slides, documents, and webpages from simple text prompts or outlines. Launched in 2023 and achieving a $2.1B valuation in November 2026, it uses AI to handle design, formatting, and visual layouts automatically. Its unique value lies in eliminating manual slide design work while maintaining professional quality and brand consistency.. Users choose it for presentations, slides, ai-design.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Sora 2: Text-to-video generation up to 20 seconds, Image-to-video with motion control, Native audio generation (dialogue, sound effects, music)
Gamma AI: AI-generated presentations from text prompts, One-click theme and layout customization, Built-in templates for various use cases

verdict: Both Sora 2 and Gamma AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Sora 2 for video-generation, Gamma AI for presentations.
